results.name: Formula for Wolfram's Rule 124 cellular automaton: a(n) = (n OR 2n) AND ((n XOR 2n) OR (n XOR 4n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..32767
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Elementary Cellular Automaton
S. Wolfram, A New Kind of Science
Index entries for sequences related to cellular automata
formula: a(n) = (n OR 2n) AND ((n XOR 2n) OR (n XOR 4n)).
a(n) = A057889(A161903(A057889(n))). [Rule 124 is the mirror image of rule 110.]
xref: Cf. A269176 (numbers not present in this sequence).
Cf. A269177 (same sequence sorted into ascending order, duplicates removed).
Cf. A269178 (numbers that occur only once).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 22 2016
